reviews.review:
Too many cheaters that don't get banned. 
I'm not sure if I get elo back or not after game when they have been banned, but if I don't the games basically sucks.
If you look away from all the cheaters, pretty decent game
one of best games on steam
Only Russians in this game but its still good

Tato je uplne skurvena bol som silvr 4 ale da mi to derank na silver dva lebo mam proti sebe zasranych cheaterov potom vyhram 6 hier competetivu a neda mi to rank up ale ked prehram dve tak to je drank vy skurveny vyvojary okamzite urobte nieco s tou hrou vy dementi skurvenci zajebany
Good game, but too many cheaters
Very good game, would recommend to learn Russian before playing
good but rusian don't have Solo server
bardzo fajna gra do pogrania a przyjaciolmi :>
Its a cool game to play with friends
Fun game, there is a learning curve to it from the players that have thousands of hours on but not to bad to get into.
pretty good game besides the 2k hour shitter that are stuck silver and keep yelling at me
